comments:
(RC3)Test case 140: Data explorer/Report parameter/parameter/string type/Display type/List box/import values/ From JDBC data set

Steps:
1. New a JDBC data set 
2. Return to edit parameter dialog in above test case
3. Click on Import value?button
4. Import value dialog pops up

Expected result:
 Import value dialog pops up

Result:
Throw exception however no dialog pop up
